snippet: One person was killed and traffic on one of the nation’s major toll roads was backed up into the evening after a dump truck hit an overpass on Tuesday morning, causing a fire and a miles-long standstill.
lead_paragraph: One person was killed and traffic on one of the nation’s major toll roads was backed up into the evening after a dump truck hit an overpass on Tuesday morning, causing a fire and a miles-long standstill.

headline.main: Truck Crash Kills One and Snarls New Jersey Turnpike for Hours
